actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A resolution to encourage bilingual signs in the United States.

summary.text: Declares that Federal, State, and local governments set a precedent for private business by making all public signs and inscriptions read in at least two different languages, one being English and the other being either Spanish, French, or Japanese, or that these signs and inscriptions be pictorially represented so that they may be universally understood.

titles.title: A resolution to encourage bilingual signs in the United States.
